info.name: Firefox | Windows 8 Scrollbar
info.description:
Based in the new windows 8 Release Preview
Work on all Firefox builds and win7 & win8
info.additionalInfo: Updates 18/09/2011 Scrollbarbutton problems fixed 30/06/2012 New arrow button transparent Works properly with http://userstyles.org/styles/76273 See my other styles http://userstyles.org/users/82707
